TEXT.TITLE: MAXXAM GROUP INC <MXM> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 1.61 dlrs vs loss 47 cts Net loss 19.2 mln vs loss 5,716,000 Revs 46.4 mln vs 11.0 mln Year Shr loss 2.01 dlrs vs loss 29 cts Net loss 24.5 mln vs loss 3,548,000 Revs 150.2 mln vs 24.4 mln NOTE: 1985 net includes tax credits of 7,336,000 dlrs in quarter and 10.2 mln dlrs in year. Results include 64.7 pct stake in Pacific Lumber Co from December 1985 through February 1987 and 100 pct thereafter. Reuter
